title: Quick Bean and Turkey Italian Meatballs

instructions.1: Mash butter beans in a large mixing bowl. Add ground turkey, egg white, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper; stir until evenly mixed. Fold bread crumbs into mixture evenly.
instructions.3: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
instructions.4: Cook meatballs in hot oil until browned on all sides, 5 to 7 minutes. Cover the skillet and continue cooking until meatballs are no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).

questions.question: In Step 4, is the skillet from Step 3 being used?
Is mixture from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is skillet from Step 3 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is skillet from Step 3 still available in Step 4?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
If we skip Step 3, is it still valid to cover the skillet in Step 4?
Can we mash (Step 1) and form (Step 2) at the same time?
